name: Crashed Bandicoot
description:
Trigger warning : violence, depression, alcoholism, suicide

Made for the  Make Something Horrible Jam 2018
It's Crash Bandicoot made by Quantic Dream!

EMOTIONS™ guaranteed with a dramatic story, revolving around loss, guilt, and depression.

At first I imported the actual Crash Bandicoot 3 game assets, but I decided to re-do everything myself -sound included- and I believe I have reached a new standard for interactive fictions.
